AT.name: Castlevania
AT.description: Castlevania war der Auftakt zu Konamis gefeierter Videospiel-Reihe, die auch heute noch sehr beliebt ist. Als Vampirjäger Simon Belmont musst du dir deinen Weg durch Draculas Schloss bahnen, in dem es von Geistern, Kobolden und Dämonen und noch mehr übernatürlichen Kreaturen wimmelt. Meistere sechs herausfordernde Level, bevor du dem Grafen gegenübertreten kannst. Um dies durchzustehen, musst du deinen Verstand und deine Waffen geschickt einsetzen. Sei vorsichtig, wenn du dich schließlich Dracula entgegenstellst, denn er hat es auf deine Kehle abgesehen. Lass dich nicht entmutigen und vergiss nicht deinen angespitzten Pflock! Wenn du diesen Titel bereits auf deiner Wii™ erworben hast, führe einen System-Transfer von deiner Wii auf deine Wii U™ durch, um ein Upgrade-Sonderangebot zu erhalten. Hierbei handelt es sich um die US-Version des Spiels.

AU.name: Castlevania
AU.description: Castlevania marked the beginning of Konami’s acclaimed series which is still going strong today. As vampire hunter Simon Belmont, you must fight your way through Dracula's castle teeming with ghosts, goblins, demons and yet more supernatural creatures; through six challenging levels to finally confront the count. You'll need your wits and weapons to survive; because when you finally meet Dracula, you know he’ll be going for the jugular. So keep your courage up and your stake sharp! If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price. This is the US version of the game.

BG.name: Castlevania

If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price. This is the US version of the game.

BE.name: Castlevania
BE.description: Castlevania est le premier volet de la saga de Konami dont le succès est toujours au rendez-vous ! Vous incarnez le chasseur de vampires Simon Belmont, et devez vous frayer un chemin dans le château de Dracula en vous battant contre des armées de fantômes, de gobelins, de démons et de créatures toujours plus surnaturelles. Venez à bout de six niveaux plus complexes les uns que les autres pour enfin défier le comte. Vous devrez utiliser votre bon sens et vos armes pour survivre, car Dracula n'hésitera pas à vous mordre lorsque vous vous attaquerez à lui ! Soyez courageux et aiguisez vos pieux ! Si vous possédez ce titre sur votre Wii, faites un transfert Wii™ vers votre Wii U™ afin d'obtenir la version améliorée à un prix spécial ! Ceci est la version américaine du jeu.

ES.name: Castlevania
ES.description: Castlevania supuso el inicio de la aclamada saga de Konami que aún hoy sigue pegando fuerte. En la piel de Simon Belmont, el cazador de vampiros, tendrás que abrirte camino por el castillo de Drácula donde a lo largo de seis desafiantes niveles te enfrentarás a fantasmas, trasgos, demonios y muchas más criaturas sobrenaturales para llegar hasta el conde. Necesitarás de tu sentido común y de tus armas para sobrevivir; ya que cuando finalmente te encuentres con Drácula, seguro que irá directo a tu yugular. ¡Así que ármate de valor y de una afilada estaca! Si posees este título en tu Wii™, puedes realizar una transferencia de datos de Wii a Wii U™ y obtener una actualización a un precio especial. Esta es la versión estadounidense del juego.

IT.name: Castlevania
IT.description: Castlevania è il primo episodio dell'omonima e apprezzata serie firmata Konami, tuttora in proseguimento. Vesti i panni di Simon Belmont, cacciatore di vampiri, e fatti strada nel castello di Dracula, popolato da spettri, goblin, demoni e tante altre creature sovrannaturali. Attraversa sei livelli differenti e affronta infine il Conte in persona! Per sopravvivere, dovrai affidarti tanto alle tue armi quanto al tuo ingegno: come ben sai, nella sfida finale Dracula mirerà alla gola! Non farti prendere dal panico e tieni pronto il tuo paletto appuntito! Se possiedi questo titolo sulla tua console Wii™, effettua un trasferimento dati su Wii U™ per potere ottenere la versione ottimizzata a un prezzo speciale! Questa è la versione americana del gioco.

NL.name: Castlevania
NL.description: Castlevania betekende het begin van Konami's beroemde reeks die vandaag de dag nog steeds populair is. Als vampierjager Simon Belmont moet je je een weg vechten door Dracula's kasteel, dat krioelt van de spoken, goblins, demonen en nog meer bovennatuurlijke wezens. Doorklief zes uitdagende levels voor je het eindelijk kunt opnemen tegen de graaf zelf. Gebruik je verstand en je wapens om te kunnen overleven, want als je op het eind Dracula tegen het lijf loopt, weet je dat hij je naar de keel zal vliegen. Wees moedig en houd je staak scherp! Als je deze titel hebt gekocht op je Wii™, kom je in aanmerking voor een speciale upgrade-prijs als je je gegevens overzet van Wii naar Wii U™. Dit is de Amerikaanse versie van het spel.

NZ.name: Castlevania
NZ.description: Castlevania marked the beginning of Konami’s acclaimed series which is still going strong today. As vampire hunter Simon Belmont, you must fight your way through Dracula's castle teeming with ghosts, goblins, demons and yet more supernatural creatures; through six challenging levels to finally confront the count. You'll need your wits and weapons to survive; because when you finally meet Dracula, you know he’ll be going for the jugular. So keep your courage up and your stake sharp! If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price. This is the US version of the game.

PL.name: Castlevania
PL.description: Castlevania marked the beginning of Konami’s acclaimed series which is still going strong today. As vampire hunter Simon Belmont, you must fight your way through Dracula's castle teeming with ghosts, goblins, demons and yet more supernatural creatures; through six challenging levels to finally confront the count. You'll need your wits and weapons to survive; because when you finally meet Dracula, you know he’ll be going for the jugular. So keep your courage up and your stake sharp! If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price. This is the US version of the game.

PT.name: Castlevania
PT.description: Castlevania marcou o início da série aclamada da Konami que ainda hoje mantém a sua popularidade. Na pele do caçador de vampiros Simon Belmont, tens de atravessar o castelo de Dracula, lutando contra fantasmas, goblins, demónios e muitas outras criaturas sobrenaturais, ao longo de seis níveis desafiantes para, por fim, defrontares o conde. Terás de recorrer à tua astúcia e às tuas armas para sobreviver, pois quando finalmente enfrentares Dracula, já saberás que ele irá atacar diretamente a jugular. Por isso, não percas a coragem e mantém a estaca afiada! Caso já tenha adquirido este título para a sua Wii, faça uma transferência de dados da sua Wii™ para a sua Wii U™ com atualizações a um preço especial. Esta é a versão do jogo para os EUA.

RU.name: Castlevania
RU.description: Castlevania — первый хит популярной серии компании Konami, который пользуется успехом и по сей день. Главный герой — охотник на вампиров по имени Simon Belmont. Ему предстоит очистить замок графа Dracula от призраков, гоблинов, демонов и других потусторонних чудовищ. Пройдя шесть сложных уровней, он вступит в финальный поединок с самим графом. Чтобы выжить, бесстрашному охотнику потребуется и ловкость, и смекалка, ведь битва с графом будет не на жизнь, а на смерть. Поэтому как следует заточите осиновый кол и не поддавайтесь панике! Если вы приобрели игру на Wii™, вы можете передать ее на консоль Wii U™ и получить скидку на обновление игры до версии Wii U. Эта версия игры предназначена для продажи в США.

SE.description: Castlevania marked the beginning of Konami’s acclaimed series which is still going strong today. As vampire hunter Simon Belmont, you must fight your way through Dracula's castle teeming with ghosts, goblins, demons and yet more supernatural creatures; through six challenging levels to finally confront the count. You'll need your wits and weapons to survive; because when you finally meet Dracula, you know he’ll be going for the jugular. So keep your courage up and your stake sharp!
